Just a question out of curiosity. Papers on NEAT says that it starts
with m=
inimal networks, inputs fully connected to outputs, and
accompanying diagra=
ms would show that the outputs are not connected to
other outputs. However,=
 in the JNEAT package i used, i noticed that
outputs are also linked to hig=
her id outputs when i initalized the
population with 0 hidden nodes ANN and=
 link probability of 1. Which
one is the correct version? which one is more=
 efficient?

Thanks.
